title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 11/04/2023 INC#1684

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1684; 10:23PM; 3719 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3REsMrl; #ExpositionPark; 84 Firefighters took just 20 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire through the roof of a vacant one-story 940 square foot commercial building, the site of a previous fire. No injury. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E227 E26 E266 E27 E294 E34 E66 EA1 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA34 RA826 SO1 SQ21 T15 T26 T27 T66 T94 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 11/04/2023 INC#1356

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1356; 10:00PM; 734 & 736 S Hartford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/49nSOph; #Westlake; *Address Correction to 734 & 736*. 64 Firefighters took more than two hours in largely defensive operations, to access and confine heavy, stubborn flames on both floors and the attic of apparently vacant and boarded 3,248 square foot two-story Craftsman-style home (built 1906) that had been converted to a residential duplex. During the earlier phases of extinguishment, an adult male exited the structure with 3rd degree burns to both legs. In critical condition, he was provided immediate care at scene and during transport a regional burn center by LAFD Paramedics. No other injuries have been reported. There are currently no reports of any civilians injured or missing in or near the heavily damaged and structurally unstable fire building. LAFD Heavy Equipment (e.g. bulldozer, excavator) was summoned to begin abating physical hazards at the collapsing structure. We anticipate LAFD personnel remaining at scene through the night to further extinguish smoldering debris and abolish physical hazards. The fire remains the focus of an active LAFD Investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E20 E203 E211 E215 E220 E227 E27 E3 E4 E95 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA13 RA811 RA827 RA9 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T11 T15 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1356; 06:54PM; 722 S Hartford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/31klcqM; #Westlake; PRELIM: Large two story reportedly vacant Craftsman-style home with heavy fire showing.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E20 E203 E211 E215 E220 E227 E27 E3 E4 E95 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA13 RA811 RA827 RA9 SQ21 SQ95 T11 T15 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 11/04/2023 INC#0985

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0985; 05:30PM; 213 E 12th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SKbN7R; #Downtown; Following fire extinguishment, during the overhaul, physical hazard abatement and investigative support phase of the incident, one LAFD Firefighter sustained non-life threatening blunt force trauma to his arm in a fall. Pursuant to protocol, he has been transported by LAFD ambulance in good condition to an area hospital for first care. No other injuries have been reported. The fire's cause remains the focus of an active investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E215 E220 E295 E3 E4 E9 E95 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 PI4 RA10 RA11 RA3 RA803 RA809 RA810 RA9 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T3 T9 T95 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 11/04/2023 INC#0985

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0985; 04:20PM; 213 E 12th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SKbN7R; #Downtown; 111 LAFD Firefighters were assigned at peak of the Greater Alarm blaze in what is considered the downtown Los Angeles Fashion District. Fire damage was skilfuly confined to *three* of *eight* adjoining businesses in the 150' x 75' row of one-story commercial buildings. Though the bulk of fire damage was held to the address of 213 East 12th Street and the two adjacent businesses, all eight commercial occupancies in the block sustained some smoke impact from the intense fire. No injuries have been reported. The fire cause remains under active investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E215 E220 E295 E3 E4 E9 E95 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 PI4 RA10 RA11 RA3 RA803 RA809 RA810 RA9 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T3 T9 T95 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 11/04/2023 INC#0985

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0985; 03:42PM; 211 E 12th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SKbN7R; #Downtown; 90 LAFD Firefighters took just 33 minutes in an aggressive and well-coordinated offensive firefighting operation to confine flames within (yet to be confirmed number of) businesses in a 150' x 75' row of one-story commercial buildings. No injuries reported. Fire cause and monetary loss to be determined.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E215 E220 E295 E3 E4 E9 E95 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA11 RA3 RA803 RA809 RA810 RA9 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T3 T9 T95 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 14; Brian Humphrey

Trapped Vehicle - Fatality; INC#0065; 01:19AM; 18101 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/40qgAwN; Northridge; Two car collision with one car against a building, one sheared hydrant, and three patients trapped. Firefighters conducted the auto extrication and transported three patients in *at least* serious condition. Additionally, two patients were determined dead on scene. All questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 0255. Drivers are advised to avoid the area as vehicles will remain in place until the completion of LAPD investigation and will impact traffic flow. ; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E104 E273 E290 E70 E73 EM15 EM17 EM9 HR3 RA100 RA104 RA70 RA73 RA87 T73 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart
